metadata.title: CVE-2022-3328 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - high
metadata.description:
Race condition in snap-confine's must_mkdir_and_open_with_perms()

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-3328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

snap-confine - 2.58.2+23.04
snapd - 2.58.2+23.04
snapd-xdg-open - 2.58.2+23.04
ubuntu-core-launcher - 2.58.2+23.04
ubuntu-core-snapd-units - 2.58.2+23.04
ubuntu-snappy - 2.58.2+23.04
ubuntu-snappy-cli - 2.58.2+23.04
No subscription required

criterions.comment: snapd package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.58.2+23.04').
